name: Roasted Chicken with Apples and Mixed Veggies
source_file: Roasted Chicken w apples and mixed veggies.txt
description: Seared chicken thighs and drumsticks roasted with carrots, garlic, onions, apples, and Brussels sprouts.
instructions: In a large skillet, season chicken with salt, pepper, and olive oil. Sear in hot pan to brown outside and place entire pan with contents in the oven.
Bake at 375Â°F. Veggies will cook in varying times, so be aware not to add them too early, or they will overcook.
When chicken has been in the oven 15 minutes, add carrots and garlic cloves.
After another 15 minutes, add onions, apples, and Brussels sprouts.
Veggies and chicken should be fully cooked after 45 minutes total, but check thighs to make sure.
